description: Land surface model simulation. Same as land-hist except with fire management maintained at 1850 levels. Start year either 1850 or 1700 depending on standard practice for particular model.
long_name: historical land-only with no human fire land management
rationale: To assess the relative impact of land cover and incremental land management change on fluxes of water, energy, and carbon in combination with other LUMIP land experiments.

requirements.keywords: 1850, 2014, Historical, Recent Past, pre-industrial to present, IPCC
requirements.label: 1850-2014 165yrs

requirements.description: Apply Global Soil Wetness Project phase three (GSWP3) forcing data for offline land surface models running the LS3MIP historical simulation land-hist is provided by the LS3MIP.
requirements.label: Historical GSWP3 Meteorological Forcing

requirements.description: Apply the global gridded land-use forcing datasets to link historical land-use data and future projections.  This new generation of “land use harmonization” (LUH2) builds upon past work from CMIP5, and includes updated inputs, higher spatial resolution, more detailed land-use transitions, and the addition of important agricultural management layers.
requirements.label: Historical Land Use

requirements.canonical_name: Historical land surface forcings except fire management
requirements.description: Apply all transient historical forcings that are relevant for the land surface model except for fire management.
requirements.keywords: LUMIP, historical, land surface forcing, no fire management
requirements.label: Historical land surface forcings except fire management

requirements.description: Maintain 1850 levels of fire management (anthropogenic ignition and suppression of fire). If ignitions are based on population density, maintain constant population density.
requirements.label: 1850 Fire Management
